items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.
items.title: iamVihanga/Ride-Service-Backend: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.

items.content_html: 基于Vue3 + THREE.JS 免费开源的三维可视化孪生场景编辑器，包含BIM轻量化、CAD解析预览、粒子系统、插件系统等特色功能。 Based on vue3 + three.js free open source 3D visual twin scene editor, including BIM lightweight, CAD analysis preview, particle system, plug-in system and other features.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that identifies company names in web pages and fetches their real-time stock prices. Designed for quick access to stock data while reading online news or articles.
items.title: Nikitha-Anand/stock-tracker-ext: A lightweight Chrome extension that identifies company names in web pages and fetches their real-time stock prices. Designed for quick access to stock data while reading online news or articles.

items.content_html: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
items.title: BAHEKARPRANAV/ButterPop.js: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
items.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.
items.title: admin-remix/canvas-sheet: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
